annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Labour hire is heavily dependent upon the quality of the personnel database and our intention has been announced to offer training at Dampier, Broome and Darwin for those who live in the North West and wish to work in the offshore industry there. Planning for this new initiative is well advanced and we expect to be running courses for prospective offshore employees in coming months. Although the training program is not directed to any particular community group, it has been encouraging to have active support from Aboriginal leaders in the Kimberley region.
annotations.translation: 劳动力招聘在很大程度上取决于人事数据库的质量，我们已宣布打算在丹皮尔、布鲁姆和达尔文为居住在西北地区并希望在那里从事离岸行业工作的人提供培训。这项新计划的规划进展顺利，我们预计将在未来几个月内为潜在的离岸员工开设课程。尽管培训计划不针对任何特定的社区群体，但金伯利地区土著领袖的积极支持令人鼓舞。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: World prospects for energy, the need for Australia to add value to its resources, Government initiatives for the support of these activities and environmental imperatives, heavily favour gas, giving every indication that Mermaid Marine's development push has been extremely timely.
annotations.translation: 世界能源的前景、澳大利亚增加其资源价值的需要、政府支持这些活动的举措以及环境方面的迫切需要，这些因素在很大程度上都有利于天然气的发展。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: It is also important to draw attention to increased efforts in terms of health, safety and environmental protection. Our workplace is largely at sea, where operations involve natural dangers and the safety of our people is paramount. We also work in a setting where the tasks in which we are involved cast us in the role of environmental caretakers of the sea and coastline.
annotations.translation: 同样重要的是提请注意在健康、安全和环境保护方面加强努力。我们的工作场所主要是在海上，在那里的业务涉及自然危险，我们人民的安全至为重要。我们还在一个环境中工作，我们所参与的任务使我们成为海洋和海岸线的环境看护者。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Over the past twelve months, we have worked even more closely with producers to take this side of our business to the highest possible standard. We are proud of the achievement and at the time of this report, despite the inherent dangers involved in the work, our employees have accrued a record 348 days free of Lost Time Injuries, a tremendous effort.
annotations.translation: 在过去的十二个月里，我们与生产商进行了更紧密的合作，将我们业务的这一方面提升到尽可能高的标准。我们为这一成就感到自豪，在撰写本报告时，尽管工作中存在固有的危险，但我们的员工已经累积了创纪录的348天无失时工伤，这是一项巨大的努力。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Average turnover for the last two years was $20 million, our target in the near term is to achieve earnings of at least $100million, with appropriate levels of accompanying profit. That will be addressed through our policy of strategic positioning and development in the North West of Australia, and also by acquisition where merger or purchase will add to our earnings and strengths. Mermaid Marine Australia Limited is in excellent shape, with confidence that we are well able to pursue and secure our ambitious program.
annotations.translation: 过去两年的平均营业额为$2,000万，我们的近期目标是实现至少$1亿的收入，并伴之以适当水平的利润。我们将通过在澳大利亚西北部的战略定位和发展政策，以及通过并购来解决这个问题，并购将增加我们的收益和优势。澳大利亚美人鱼海洋有限公司的情况非常好，我们有信心能够实施并确保我们雄心勃勃的计划。
